custom_css: .social-media-footer ul li a {color: var(--color-scheme-feature-text-transparent60); transition: all 0.15s ease-in-out 0s;}

settings.testimonial_text: “This online boutique is one of my favorite places to shop of all time! Bitter Grace Boutique has positioned itself to be a leader in the purposeful fashion market. I always feel great that a portion of my purchases are paid forward to organizations I believe in.”

“By way of the Bitter Grace and the Inner Elegance Community, I’ve met some of the most empowering and talented people I've had the pleasure of meeting. I love how it's all tied by this concept that Elegance comes from within.”
“The clothing you carry is beautiful, the encouragement to each of us is wonderful, and your support to our community and those in need is priceless. I highly recommend Bitter Grace!”

settings.paragraph-item-1: We will repair any garments that did not meet our product standards and commitment to quality.
settings.paragraph-item-2: We are committed to reducing waste by producing in small batch quantities.
settings.paragraph-item-3: We intentionally choose natural fabrics and plastic-free materials for our garments.
